name: Jetpack Vacation
description:
Take flight and unlock the sky with your own handheld jetpacks! Tourism Infinity invites you to explore Jetpack Island, a tropical paradise and your gateway to exciting jetpack-based Excursions.

Compete for Victory at the Jetpack Stadium Excursion!

Sharpen Your Aim in the Target Practice Excursion!

More Excursions To Come After Launch:

JETPACK RACING! (Coming Soon)

Click Here To Join Our Community!
